bugs.summary: Missing semantic HTML elements preventing screen reader compatibility
bugs.description: The product page lacks proper semantic HTML structure required for accessibility compliance and screen reader support.
bugs.testCase: 1.6.5. Kiểm tra tương thích với screen readers
bugs.fullTestTitle: GUI Checklist 1.6 - TÍNH TƯƠNG THÍCH (COMPATIBILITY) 1.6.5. Kiểm tra tương thích với screen readers
bugs.errorMessage: AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 4000ms: Expected to find element: `main, section, article, header, footer`, but never found it.
stepsToReproduce: Verify that the product name is visible using [data-test="product-name"]
Check for presence of semantic HTML elements: main, section, article, header, footer
Attempt to locate these elements on the page
bugs.expectedResult: The page should contain proper semantic HTML structure with at least one of the following elements: main, section, article, header, or footer for accessibility compliance
bugs.actualResult: No semantic HTML elements (main, section, article, header, footer) found on the page
bugs.impact: Affects accessibility compliance and screen reader users
bugs.screenshotPath: cypress/screenshots/compatibility.cy.js/GUI Checklist 1.6 - TÍNH TƯƠNG THÍCH (COMPATIBILITY) -- 1.6.5. Kiểm tra tương thích với screen readers (failed).png
recommendations: Add proper semantic HTML structure to the product page
Ensure ARIA attributes are properly implemented
Conduct accessibility audit using tools like axe-core

bugs.summary: No form elements present affecting JavaScript-disabled functionality
bugs.description: The product page lacks form elements with proper action attributes, preventing proper functionality when JavaScript is disabled.
bugs.testCase: 1.6.6. Xác nhận hoạt động với JavaScript disabled
bugs.fullTestTitle: GUI Checklist 1.6 - TÍNH TƯƠNG THÍCH (COMPATIBILITY) 1.6.6. Xác nhận hoạt động với JavaScript disabled
bugs.errorMessage: AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 4000ms: Expected to find element: `form`, but never found it.
stepsToReproduce: Verify that the product name is visible using [data-test="product-name"]
Check for the presence of <form> elements on the page
Verify if forms have proper action attributes for fallback functionality
bugs.expectedResult: The page should contain form elements with proper action attributes to ensure basic functionality works even when JavaScript is disabled
bugs.actualResult: No <form> elements found on the product page
bugs.impact: Progressive enhancement fails; users with JavaScript disabled cannot interact with the page properly
bugs.screenshotPath: cypress/screenshots/compatibility.cy.js/GUI Checklist 1.6 - TÍNH TƯƠNG THÍCH (COMPATIBILITY) -- 1.6.6. Xác nhận hoạt động với JavaScript disabled (failed).png
recommendations: Implement server-side form handling for critical user actions
Add <form> elements with proper action and method attributes
Ensure progressive enhancement principles are followed
Test functionality with JavaScript completely disabled
